description: Moscow insists US and UK accusations that Russia tested anti-satellite weaponry are "distorted".
title: Russia satellite: Kremlin accuses US and UK of 'distorting' truth
title_page: Russia satellite: Kremlin accuses US and UK of 'distorting' truth - BBC News
maintext: The US said the Russian satellite system was the same one it raised concerns about in 2018 and earlier this year, when the US accused it of manoeuvring close to an American satellite.
